scripts.d1:tables:local: wrangler d1 execute DB --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.d1:tables:remote: wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.d1:count:remote: wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --command "SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM metrics_daily;"
